Absorb 50% of incoming damage for 1 random ally hero. (Maximum use per turn = 3) (Prioritizes ally closest to this hero). At the same time, Bromlin gains the ability to become unkillable when his HP reaches 0 for the first time in battle for 2 turns. While in this unkillable state, Bromlin will retain 1 HP. In this mode, any control ability targeted at Bromlin will be nullified. However, in this state, any healing ability or shield ability will only be 50% effective. After these 2 turns, Bromlin will regain 25% of his maximum HP. This ability can only be activated once per battle.
